description: Manage and evaluate tasks efficiently with session-based task lists and real-time progress tracking. Update task properties, retrieve statuses, and score completed tasks to streamline your workflow. Enhance AI assistant integrations with structured task orchestration and comprehensive evaluation metrics.

capabilities.name: create_tasklist
capabilities.description: Create a new task list for the current session. Can optionally include initial tasks.

capabilities.name: update_task
capabilities.description: Update a specific task's properties including title, status, acceptance criteria, or evaluation score.

capabilities.name: get_status
capabilities.description: Get the current status of all tasks in a task list, or a specific task by ID.
